# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the filled column suitable for debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Describing a Column

- **description**: A mirror that reflects the filled column.
- **description(options:)**: Generates a string description of the filled column.

items.description: A mirror that reflects the filled column.
items.name: description

items.description: Generates a string description of the filled column.
